message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can find a price closer to my valuation. I would like to propose a price of $10500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your valuation, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $11500.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am proposing a price of $11000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product for $11800.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $11500 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $11500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $12200.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $12400.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $12300 for the product.
